snippet: A panel discussion on preservation, featuring various architects, is part of the opening-night festivities before an exhibition, “The Landmarks of New York,” at the Parrish Art Museum in Southampton.
lead_paragraph: A panel discussion on preservation, featuring various architects, is part of the opening-night festivities before an exhibition, “The Landmarks of New York,” at the Parrish Art Museum in Southampton.

headline.seo: ‘The Landmarks of New York’ Is Coming to the Parrish Art Museum
headline.main: Dissecting the Future of Landmarks Preservation
headline.print_headline: Dissecting the Future of Landmarks Preservation
